title: Boston University Presidential Scholarship 2025 in USA (Funded)
excerpt:
University: Boston University
Degree: Undergraduate
Coverage: $25,000
All Nationalities
Deadline: 1 Dec 2025
full_content: Applications are invited to apply for Boston University Presidential Scholarship 2025 in United States. The University sponsors a wide range of funded scholarships for international students. This scholarship provides $25,000 per year for undergraduate degree students, welcoming applicants from all nationalities. Deadline to apply: 1st December 2025. Visit official website to apply: https://www.bu.edu/admissions/tuition-aid/scholarships-financial-aid/first-year-merit/presidential/
author: AWB Travels and Tours Ltd

title: Millions May Face EU Visa Free Travel Restrictions Soon
excerpt: Hold on to your passports — the European Union has just hit the brakes on unlimited visa-free travel...

title: Poland Study Visa New Rules in Effect from July 1, 2025
excerpt: Poland has just dropped a game-changing update that every international student needs to know before applying for a study visa.

title: NASA Postdoctoral Program 2025 Deadline Extended
excerpt: NASA has just extended the current NPP application cycle, giving you extra time to shoot for the stars.

title: Gotoh Tokyu Group Fully-funded Scholarship 2026 at Tokyo City University
excerpt: Launched with the mission to support outstanding privately financed international students.

title: English Language Requirements for New Zealand AEWV Changed
excerpt: New requirement in town: Immigration NZ now requires proof of English ability for AEWV jobs at level 4 or 5.

title: Gabon Simplifies Entry with Free Tourist e-Visa Until Sept 30, 2025
excerpt: Visa processed in under 48 hours, valid July 1 to Sept 30. Part of Gabon's tourism boost.

title: Portugal Extends Validity of Residence Permits Until Oct 15, 2025
excerpt: Extension for permits expiring between Feb 2020 and June 2025. Apply by Oct 15 to get 180 more days.

title: Polish Visa Rule: Single Permit Now Requires Entry on National Work Visa
excerpt: Student visa holders and Schengen residents must now enter Poland with a national work visa.

title: UK Tightens Work Visa Rules: 111 Jobs Removed from Skilled Route
excerpt: Care worker route ending. New rules raise skill thresholds and reduce migration.

title: IndiGo Launches Mumbai–Manchester Flights
excerpt: Non-stop long-haul service between India and the UK launched with premium in-flight services.

title: University of Genova Scholarships 2026 in Italy (Funded)
excerpt: Fully funded scholarships for undergraduate, Masters, and PhD programs.

title: Sir Edward Youde Memorial Scholarships 2026 in Hong Kong
excerpt: Program encourages winners to return and contribute to Hong Kong SAR after graduation.

title: ANZSOG Academic Fellows Program 2026 in Australia
excerpt: Developing leadership qualities in public sector managers across Australia and NZ.

title: Emirates Group Internship 2026 in UAE (Paid)
excerpt: Applications open for Emirates Group’s paid international internship program in 2026.

title: Macquarie University Research Scholarship 2025–26 (Fully Funded)
excerpt: Macquarie University welcomes international students for fully funded research programs.
